title: After Transmigrating I And The Villain - Novel Updates
tags: Autism   Cultivation   Demonic Cultivation Technique   Doting Love Interests   Early Romance   Farming   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   World Hopping
author: 毒步天下
description:
There were always villains with frustrating fates and miserable lives, here the heroine transmigrated to save the villain’s miserable life and create a HE.

1. Husband Robbed in 80's

2. The Housekeeper Daughter's love

3. Demon Lord with a Farm Girl

(These are three independent fluffy short stories with three different male leads and female leads.)>
